name: Radiance Vitamin C Face Serum with Centella + Hyaluronic Acid
about: What it is: A high-potency serum with actives such as triphala, centella, and hyaluronic acid that is clinically shown to visibly brighten, firm, and reduce fine lines...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness..Highlighted Ingredients:- Triphala: Potent vitamin C visibly brightens, smooths, protects, and supports..- Gotu Kola: Supports the production of collagen and visibly reduces fine lines and wrinkles..- Hyaluronic Acid: Increases hydration and visibly improves elasticity and smooths fine lines...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It also comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Thousands of years ago, Ayurvedic scholars used rejuvenating Rasayana plants to create age-defying elixirs for India’s royal family. Sahajan went back to the ancient texts to create this formula that is clinically shown to support the production of collagen, visibly brighten, and hydrate to deliver firmer-, plumper-looking skin...Clinical Results: In a 28 and 42-day clinical study of 35 women ages 35 to 60 using the serum twice daily:.- 94% of users showed improvement in fine lines and wrinkles in 6 weeks.- 88% users found it created healthier looking skin.- 88% said it made skin appear youthful..CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -Triphala: Potent vitamin C visibly brightens, smooths, protects, and supports..-Gotu Kola: Supports the production of collagen and visibly reduces fine lines and wrinkles..-Hyaluronic Acid: Increases hydration and visibly improves elasticity and smooths fine lines....Water/Eau/Aqua, Glycerin, Centella Asiatica Extract, Polyglyceryl-4 Oleate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Terminalia Bellerica Fruit Extract, Terminalia Chebula Extract, Emblica Officinalis Fruit Extract,Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Fragrance (Parfum), Santalum Album (Sandalwood) Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Titanium....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-On freshly cleansed skin, apply two to three drops of serum..-Massage evenly onto face, neck, and décolletage..-Apply morning and night or as often as required..-For best results, follow with Sahajan’s Nourish Crème Riche (sold separately)....Recycling Instructions:.-Rinse the bottle and recycle..-Rinse the dropper and drop off at your nearest Pact bin or discard as waste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this serum. It is lightweight and absorbs well. My skin is noticeably more hydrated, bright, and it gives my skin a lovely glow. As a bonus, it also has a lovely, light scent.

I am waiting to see if repeated use shows the promised results.

reviews.review_title: Hands feel plump after applying but it works!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So far so good. The first two uses, my skin looked drier which was confusing but then it started to feel like it was moisturizing. No acne or anything, and my skin appears to be smoother already--only 4 days in.  I don't know why but when I apply this stuff, my hands feel swollen until I wash them. Maybe it's a ME thing but it could be whatever plumping agent is in it. My face doesn't look plump or feel weird, just my hands. I kind of wanted this stuff to fail so I didn't have to repurchase at this price.lol
